snippet: Beyoncé's cover story in Essence magazine about taking nine months off from her career has drawn fire from from some quarters on social media sites and blogs.
abstract: Beyoncé's cover story in Essence magazine about taking nine months off from her career has drawn fire from from some quarters on social media sites and blogs.

headline.main: Black Journalists Association's Award for Beyoncé Draws Criticism
headline.print_headline: Journalists Group’s Award For Beyoncé Criticized
